Segment.name: PWK
Segment.comment: To identify the type or transmission or both of paperwork or supporting information

Field.name: ReportTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

Field.name: ReportTransmissionCode
Field.comment: Code defining timing, transmission method or format by which reports are to be sent

Field.name: ReportCopiesNeeded
Field.comment: The number of copies of a report that should be sent to the addressee

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: ActionsIndicated
Field.comment: Actions to be performed on the piece of paperwork identified

Field.name: RequestCategoryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a type of request

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PWK05 or PWK06 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PWK10 or PWK11 is present, then the other is required.
